title: Mount Rushmore Face Carving Obsession
summary: Trump told someone: 'Do you know it's my dream to have my face on Mount Rushmore?' - 'He wasn't laughing, so he was totally serious.' 2020: Trump denied New York Times report about speaking with South Dakota Governor Kristi Noem about adding his face to Mount Rushmore, but said it 'sounds like a good idea to me!' Noem gave Trump a bust of Mount Rushmore that included his face in 2020. 2025: Rep. Anna Paulina Luna filed legislation to carve Trump's face on Mount Rushmore (H.R.792).
keyFacts: Trump previously said: 'Do you know it's my dream to have my face on Mount Rushmore?'
Witness said 'He wasn't laughing, so he was totally serious'
2020: Trump denied report about requesting to be added to Mount Rushmore
Trump added: 'sounds like a good idea to me!'
Governor Kristi Noem gave Trump a bust of Mount Rushmore that included his face (2020)
2025: Rep. Anna Paulina Luna filed H.R.792 to direct carving of Trump's figure on Mount Rushmore
Mount Rushmore features Washington, Jefferson, Theodore Roosevelt, and Lincoln
Experts say there's no room on the mountain for additional carving
Would require act of Congress to proceed
